original_text: You must completely destroy anyone who offers a sacrifice to a false god. You must only offer sacrifices to the Lord.
korean_text: 여호와 외에 다른 신에게 제사를 드리는 자는 멸할지니라

sentences.original_text: who offers a sacrifice to a false god
You must only offer sacrifices to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 오직 주께만 제물을 드려야 합니다
